definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
fish brings heat, meat brings phlegm, vegetables and tofu keep you healthy
pinyin: yu2 sheng1 huo3 , rou4 sheng1 tan2 , qing1 cai4 dou4 fu5 bao3 ping2 an1
containing_words.word: 魚生火，肉生痰，青菜豆腐保平安

sentences.english: The fruit or seed of a leguminous plant such as or or lentils .
sentences.chinese: 豆科植物的果實或種子，如豌豆，菜豆，等。

sentences.english: Pour the sauce over the tomatoes and beans. Toss the salad well and serve.
sentences.chinese: 把醬潑在西紅柿和菜豆上，拌一拌就可以享用了。

sentences.english: Task 1. Genetic analysis of inheritance of seed coat colour in Phaseolus vulgaris L.
sentences.chinese: 實作一，對菜豆種皮顏色的遺傳性狀進行分析。

sentences.english: We planted beans and peas in the field.
sentences.chinese: 我們在田裏種上了菜豆和豌豆。

sentences.english: I won't even dignify your navy bean suggestion.
sentences.chinese: 我不認爲你的菜豆建議值得考慮。

sentences.english: The frozen baby limas are delicious.
sentences.chinese: 那些冰凍過的小玩意菜豆可是很美味的哦。

definition: variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
cabbage (round cabbage most commonly found in Western countries)
